comment: * Implementors of this interface can set themselves as update listeners * to a TimeAnimator instance to receive callbacks on every animation * frame to receive the total time since the animator started and the delta time * since the last frame. The first time the listener is called, * deltaTime will be zero. The same is true for totalTime, unless the animator was * set to a specific {@link ValueAnimator#setCurrentPlayTime(long) currentPlayTime} * prior to starting.

methods.name: void onTimeUpdate(TimeAnimator animation, long totalTime, long deltaTime)
methods.comment:
*

Notifies listeners of the occurrence of another frame of the animation, * along with information about the elapsed time.

* * @param animation The animator sending out the notification. * @param totalTime The total time elapsed since the animator started, in milliseconds. * @param deltaTime The time elapsed since the previous frame, in milliseconds.

methodNames: void onTimeUpdate(TimeAnimator animation, long totalTime, long deltaTime)
